1179760.name: DeedPlanner
1179760.description:
DeedPlanner is a free, open source, easy to use design tool for rapid house and deed planning for Wurm Online and Wurm Unlimited.

Program Features


  • View and edit your deed from any angle and perspective you want, with 2d, 3d and isometric views available!
  • Rapidly prototype your ideas before trying them in Wurm Online or Wurm Unlimited
  • Import your deeds from Wurm Online and Wurm Unlimited into the DeedPlanner thanks to deed export feature
  • Edit ground tiles, floors, walls, roofs, heightmap and decorations like trees or chests.
  • Use the program anywhere you want - Steam, desktop standalone or web browser, with mobile version under development.
  • Save your maps locally or to Pastebin, and load them from wide variety of supported services.
  • Hotlink your Pastebin maps, to make them just one click away!
  • Use large database with most of the Wurm objects added to make your DeedPlanner deed look as close to the in-game deed as possible.
  • Use undo/redo to experiment and recover from mistakes.
  • Experience virtual walk around your village using Wurmian mode that simulates in-game point of view!
1179760.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
